body.name: Retrowand Retro Gaming Console, 2023 New Retrowand Video Game Console (4K+64GB) Has 20,000 Retro Games, Plug and Play Retrowand Gaming Stick, 2.4G Wireless Controller Gamepad Game Stick
features: 【Relive the Golden Age of Gaming】Retro Gaming Wand is your time machine back to the 80s and 90s. With 20,000 retro games built-in, you can play different games every day. No download required, just plug in the monitor and start playing.

【Easy to Use】Simply plug and play by connecting it directly to your TV's HDMI port. It's the ultimate 4K game stick lite that seamlessly delivers your favorite classics every time. What's more, it's versatile and can be hooked up to a computer, monitor, projector, and more.

【HD Output for a More Comfortable Gaming Experience】The retro game stick is suitable for 4K ultra-high-definition TV/computer/monitor/projector, supports HDMI output with 1080P high-definition quality, perfectly meets your high-resolution and game configuration needs. Connect to TV with the mini HDMI cable and enjoy lively and entertaining video games on the big screen.

【Plug and Play & 2.4GHz Wireless Controller】No installation, no network connection, just connect any TV or screen with HDMI input interface to play 10000+ classic games. Retro stick is equipped with two 2.4GHz wireless controllers, no messy cables, sensitive without lag, supporting 2 people to play games together.

【Enjoy with Friends and Family】This Retro Gaming Wand includes 2 free wireless controllers, ensuring that your gaming sessions are not just about the games but also about bonding.Have an encounter with retro games with friends during the holidays! Reminisce about childhood together, I believe you will have a great time playing games.
body.description: Retrowand Retro Gaming Console, 2023 New Retrowand Video Game Console (4K+64GB) Has 20,000 Retro Games, Plug And Play Retrowand Gaming Stick, 2.4G Wireless Controller Gamepad Game Stick Features: 1.HD Output for a More Comfortable Gaming Experience. 2.Relive the Golden Age of Gaming. 3.Easy to Use 4.2.4GHz Wireless Controller Note: 1. Do Not Format the Sd Card, the Game is Stored in the Card. 2. When You Receive the Product, the Sd Card Has Been Installed in the Card Slot. 3. The Game List Can Be Viewed by Scanning the Code in the Instruction Manual. 4. Most Games Can Be Entered Normally, but Some Games Will Crash Due to Incompatibility. It's Normal. 5. When the Handle is Not in Use, the Handle Protection Mechanism Will Enter the Dormant State to Save Energy. the Light Will Be off at This Time. Just Turn the Slider Again from off to on and the Light Will Turn on Again. 6. Qr Code for the Operation Video at the End of the Manual, You Can Scan the Code and Watch It Yourself. 7. The Handle is Only Powered by 2 Aaa Batteries (not Included). It Cannot Be Rechargeable. How to Use: Step 1: Plug the retroswift game stick into Your Tv Via HDMI. Step 2: Put Your Tv into the Correct HDMI Input. Step 3:now Just Relax & Enjoy over 10,000+ Retro Games! Package Includes: 2 PCS * Wireless Controller Gamepad 1 PCS * Retrowand Retro Gaming Console 1 PCS * Receiver 1 PCS * USB Cable 1 PCS * TF Card 1 PCS * User Manual Note: 1. Due to manual measurement, there is a certain error in the product size. 2. Due to lighting effects and shooting angles, there may be chromatic aberration in the product, please understand.
